abstract: British Airways and Spain’s Iberia said on Tuesday that they are in negotiations to strike an all-stock merger, months after British Airways dropped a bid to buy the Spanish airline.
lead_paragraph: British Airways and Spain’s Iberia said on Tuesday that they are in negotiations to strike an all-stock merger, months after British Airways dropped a bid to buy the Spanish airline.

headline.main: B.A. Enters Merger Talks With Iberia
